comments: The generic name in this combination is not currently considered to apply to an organism within the fungal clade (vide Index Fungorum)
examples: Glugea vayssierei (E. Hesse) Auerbach [as 'vayssieri'], Die Cnidosporidien: 38, 191 (1910)
source: Index Fungorum; Forename & dates from: Alexander B. Doweld (IFPNI)
